entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @RealJamesWoods @realDonaldTrump Actually, @JoeBiden has spoke out about COVID-19 on everything from WH messaging  to testing to obtaining PPE to encouraging ppl to follow CDC guidelines.  Why should he say anything more?  After all, he's not POTUS....yet.
